name: barbell hip thrust
description: A compound glute exercise performed with a barbell. Sit on the ground with your back against a bench, place the barbell across your hips, and thrust your hips upward to create a bridge position.
instructions:
1. Sit on the ground with your back against a bench or elevated surface

2. Place a barbell across your hips (use a pad for comfort)

3. Bend your knees and place your feet flat on the ground

4. Drive through your heels and thrust your hips upward

5. Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement

6. Lower your hips back down to the starting position

7. Repeat for desired number of repetitions
safety_tips: Keep your core engaged throughout the movement. Avoid arching your lower back excessively. Use a pad or towel under the barbell for comfort. Start with lighter weights to perfect your form.

name: smith machine hip thrust
description: A glute exercise performed on a Smith machine. This variation provides stability and allows for easier weight progression compared to free weight hip thrusts.
instructions:
1. Position a bench in front of the Smith machine

2. Sit on the ground with your back against the bench

3. Place the Smith machine bar across your hips (use a pad for comfort)

4. Bend your knees and place your feet flat on the ground

5. Unrack the bar and drive through your heels to thrust your hips upward

6. Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement

7. Lower your hips back down to the starting position

8. Repeat for desired number of repetitions
safety_tips: Keep your core engaged throughout the movement. The Smith machine provides stability but still maintain proper form. Use a pad under the bar for comfort. Control the movement in both directions.

description: Cable straight arm pull down using bar attachment for lat isolation

safety_tips: Keep arms straight, maintain slight bend in knees, control movement

safety_tips: Keep chest up, knees in line with toes

name: hip thrust machine
description: A dedicated machine for performing hip thrusts. This machine is specifically designed for glute development and provides a guided range of motion.
instructions:
1. Sit in the hip thrust machine with your back against the pad

2. Position your feet on the foot platform

3. Adjust the seat and pad position for proper alignment

4. Select your desired weight on the machine

5. Drive through your heels and thrust your hips upward

6. Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement

7. Lower your hips back down to the starting position

8. Repeat for desired number of repetitions
safety_tips: Adjust the machine settings to fit your body size. Keep your core engaged throughout the movement. The machine provides a guided range of motion, but still focus on proper form and glute activation.

name: Barbell Reverse Grip Row

name: leg press calf raise
description: A calf exercise performed on a leg press machine. Position your feet on the platform with only the balls of your feet, then press the weight up and perform calf raises by extending your ankles.
instructions:
1. Sit in the leg press machine and position your feet on the platform

2. Place only the balls of your feet on the platform, heels hanging off

3. Press the weight up to full leg extension

4. Perform calf raises by extending your ankles as far as possible

5. Lower your heels back down to the starting position

6. Repeat for desired number of repetitions
safety_tips: Keep your back pressed firmly against the seat back. Avoid locking your knees at the top of the movement. Start with a lighter weight to perfect your form before increasing resistance.

name: cable kickback
description: An isolation exercise for the glutes performed using a cable machine. This exercise targets the gluteus maximus and helps improve glute activation and development.
instructions:
1. Attach an ankle strap to a low cable pulley

2. Face the cable machine and hold onto the frame for support

3. Attach the ankle strap to your working leg

4. Keep your working leg slightly bent and your core engaged

5. Kick your leg back and up in a controlled motion

6. Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement

7. Slowly return your leg to the starting position

8. Repeat for desired number of repetitions, then switch legs
safety_tips: Keep your core engaged throughout the movement. Avoid swinging or using momentum. Focus on feeling the glutes contract. Start with lighter weight to perfect your form. Maintain proper posture and avoid arching your lower back.

description: Cable row with V-handle for neutral grip back development

safety_tips: Keep feet off ground, controlled movement

name: Cable Wide Grip Row
description: Cable row with wide grip for upper back focus
instructions: Sit or stand with wide grip, pull cable to chest
safety_tips: Keep back straight, squeeze shoulder blades

name: Cable Chest Fly Low
description: Cable chest fly exercise targeting lower chest fibers
instructions: Stand between cable machine, adjust pulleys to high position, bring handles together in downward arc motion
safety_tips: Keep slight bend in elbows, control the movement, focus on lower chest contraction

name: ISO-Lateral Shoulder Press
description: Machine-based shoulder press with independent arm movement
instructions: Sit in machine, press handles overhead independently
safety_tips: Adjust seat height, keep back against pad, control each arm separately

name: Cable Chest Fly High
description: Cable chest fly exercise targeting upper chest fibers
instructions: Stand between cable machine, adjust pulleys to low position, bring handles together in upward arc motion
safety_tips: Keep slight bend in elbows, control the movement, focus on upper chest contraction

name: Plate Loaded Ab Crunch Bench
description: Plate-loaded ab crunch machine for core strength and development
instructions: Sit in machine, adjust seat and weight, perform controlled crunch motion by bringing chest toward knees
safety_tips: Adjust seat position, select appropriate weight, maintain controlled movement, avoid using momentum

name: Seated Face Pull
description: Cable face pull exercise in seated position
instructions: Sit with cable at face height, pull rope to face while spreading arms
safety_tips: Keep back straight, pull to face level, squeeze shoulder blades

name: Alternating Cable Step Up
description: Step up exercise using cable machine for resistance, performed with alternating legs
instructions: Set up cable at low position, attach handle to ankle or use cable handle. Step up onto platform with one leg, alternating legs with each repetition. Keep core engaged and maintain balance.
safety_tips: Start with lighter weight, ensure platform is stable, keep knee aligned with toes, control the movement throughout
